infos.value: Supposedly, that cube can grant battle experience in an instant simply by holding it in your hand and making a silent wish.
I wish for you to use it, Lord Mont.
Congratulations! As your level has increased, you are now able to increase your Job level as well.
I have prepared the necessary materials, so go ahead and use them.
Your Job level has increased. Now, we shall enhance your abilities.
Though you currently possess only a few types of abilities, I am looking forward to witnessing your growth and seeing you master a diverse array of skills, Lord Mont.
That is all the basic information you need to know for now. Try progressing through Story Mode to unlock more features.
• Enhancing Units via EXP Cubes •

• Enhancing Units via EXP Cubes •
By acquiring EXP, units will level up and receive a stat boost.
• Enhancing Units via EXP Cubes II •
EXP can be earned even outside of battle. One way to do so is via <color=#00ffff>EXP Cubes</color>.
• Enhancing Units via EXP Cubes IV •

<color=#00ffff>S Cubes</color> are used successfully with <color=#00ffff>low-level units</color>, while <color=#00ffff>M and L Cubes</color> are better used on <color=#00ffff>high-level units</color>.
• Enhancing Main Jobs •

• Enhancing Jobs •
Gather enough essential items and you can enhance your unit's Main Job.
• Enhancing Main Jobs II •
As a Job's <color=#00ffff>level</color> increases, <color=#00ffff>bonuses</color> will be applied to the unit's <color=#00ffff>stats</color>...
• Enhancing Main Jobs III •
...and <color=#00ffff>new abilities</color> can even be <color=#00ffff>unlocked</color>.
• Enhancing Abilities •

• Enhancing Abilities •
Enhancing abilities requires JP and gil.
• Enhancing Abilities •

Enhancing will boost the following stats:
-Attack-Type Ability Damage
-Buff/Debuff Ability Effects
-Status Ailment Ability Effects
